Eugene.Coburg, Oregon: Coburg is a city (and a National Historic District) in Lane County, Oregon, United States, 8 miles (13 km) a few miles north of Eugene. The city's population as of the 2010 census was 1,035. Founded in 1847, Coburg has retained the characteristics of traditional small town with walkable and close ties to the surrounding farming communities that stretch in all directions.
